sentence: Why did prince oxygen inherit the throne after the king died? because he was the rightful heir
explanation: A person who is legally entitled to the property or rank of another on that persons death.
first_new_sentence: An heir is expected to inherit the familys estate.
second_new_sentence: The kings heir was well-prepared for his future responsibilities.

sentence: What did the fish say when it ran into a wall? dam
explanation: A barrier built to hold back water
